item.title: Buffett’s Cash Hoard Signals Market Caution, Value Plays Emerge
item.description: Warren Buffett's cash pile has grown to levels not seen since the last great market selloffs, a sign that he could be expecting lower prices ahead.

item.title: DLocal Stock Soars 43% After Earnings Beat and Raised Guidance
item.description: DLocal’s Q2 results smashed expectations across revenue, profitability, and free cash flow, with TPV up 53% YoY and adjusted EBITDA up 64%.

item.title: Can AI Defense Contracts Push Palantir Shares Higher?
item.description: Palantir’s strong government contracts and expanding commercial revenue position PLTR for long-term growth despite near-term volatility

item.title: D-Wave Buying Spree: Will These Firms Be Potential Targets?
item.description: D-Wave Quantum is likely to begin to explore M&A deals in the coming months; these companies represent a few of the potential targets.

item.title: Home Depot Holds Gains After Narrow Q2 Misses
item.description: Home Depot stock climbs on better-than-feared Q2 results, strong comps, and steady margins, though technicals hint at overbought conditions
